methuma aacharya ediriwira sarathchandra mahatha samanga “janarangana sabhawa“ tada ekwi atha punchi rala, punchi ralage maranaya, kalo ayanthi, charitha thunak, delowata nathi aya, parajithayo, aprasanna kathawak, mathu sambandhayi, rajapaksha walawwa, adhishtanaya, pithamaha, ardha nawakathawak, piya saha puththu, mahallekuge prema kathawak, maya malinga eka geyi awurudda, athiranaya, punaruthpaththiya, wajira pabbatha, katu saha mal, nonimi siththama, diyaniya aapasu yayi padya kruthi wiyodasatha sinhala katha kalawe wikashanaya, nawakathawa ha samajaya, sahithya wichara satahana, jathika sahithyaya ha wessanthara, samaja pragathiya ha sahithyaya, sahithya nirmanaye mul potha, daiwayoga wicharaya, nuthana sinhala nawakathawata sanskruthiya pasubima issaraha balanno, dingiri, irunu balala, mihibata surapura, ruwan kumari, dan dan dadan dan sirisena rathnayaka upanne 1929 pebarawari 5 wana dina madawala dambaadeni udukaha dakunu rohale diya.

(janadhipathi madhya anshaya yatathe athi niwsdotelke web adawiya)pasugiya 06 da irida lankadipa puwath patha mese wartha kaleya:‘‘'rajya nowana sanwidhanawalata awashya ayurin aandu kirimata thaman sudanam nathayi, ema sanwidhana kiyana ayurin hamudawata chodana pathra dimata thaman sudanam nathayi ki janadhipathiwaraya, hamudawata, polisiyata wiruddhawa mona chodana aawath eewa prathikshepa kara owun aaraksha kirimata katayuthu karana bawa" prakasha kaleya.mema prakashayan 2015 janadhipathiwaranayen pasu merata prajathanthrawadayata ella wu barapathalama abhiyogayayi.
